title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Tuesday, 16 February 2016 - BBC News
summary: former us basketball star shaquille o'neal has backed northampton town 's promotion push in a youtube video .
northampton has become a `` dumping ground for old taxis '' after changes to licensing rules , according to town cabbies .
councillors in kettering are to discuss the possibility of dna profiling of dogs to reduce fouling .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live for northamptonshire has finished for today , but we 'll be back tomorrow with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel .

documents.title: lamb slaughtered in field in silverstone
text: police say a lamb has been slaughtered and its carcass taken from a field in silverstone .
it was taken some time between 11:00 yesterday and 09:30 today , and officers would like to speak to anyone who may have witnessed anyone acting sus in the area during that time .
it follows several other cases of sheep being killed and butchered in the county - namely in crick , denton and brafield-on-the green .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: headlines : go-ahead for police buildings lamb slaughter at silverstone
text: headlines for this evening :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : dry tonight , chilly start tomorrow with sunny spells later
text: staying dry this evening with cloud increasing gradually from the west , so not as cold as last night , but there is still the risk of a frost as temperatures fall just below freezing with lows of -2c ( 28f ) .
tomorrow , a chilly start to the day with some bright or sunny spells and generally more cloud around with high temperatures of 5c ( 41f ) .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: charity founder praises corby women
text: the founder of a charity which helps fund education in gambia has praised two women from corby who have been given honorary citizenship of a village for their work in schools .

andrew butler , founder of the northampton trustee fund , praised eleanor springham and chelsea macfarlane , who first went to the penyem village about four years ago as part of a sixth trip from kingswood school , corby .
mr butler said : `` they are very brave to go and live in the village .
we took a group of sixth form students to the village , and the eleanor and chelsea have followed it through .
it is so rewarding to see them go back there . ''

documents.title: two corby women made honorary citizens of gambian village
text: two young women from corby have been made honorary citizens of penyem village in gambia .

eleanor springham and chelsea macfarlane lived in the village for three weeks and have visited the country on previous occasions with the northampton trustee fund - a charity that raises money to help the village .
it 's provided books and furniture for the school , sponsored the children there and built a health centre .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: two police buildings given go-ahead by police and crime commissioner
text: up to 350 police officers and staff are set to get two new premises , the office of the county 's police and crime commissioner , adam simmonds , has tweeted
@ adamsoffice formally approves new @ twitterid buildings + 2016 policing tax precept also given green light :

documents.title: it 's been a sunny , crisp day across most of northamptonshire
text: there 's been some glorious sunshine in much of northamptonshire today , as we can see in this pic from bbc weather watcher 'ele ' in higham ferrars
if you 'd like to find out more about becoming a bbc weather watcher click here .

documents.title: biomass plant plan for daventry
text: a scheme for a biomass renewable energy generation plant in daventry is going before northamptonshire county council .
earthworm energy wants to convert its composting plant in brown road , royal oak , into a plant to process 30,000 tonnes of pre-shredded wood waste - to generate one megawatt of energy a year .
the plans go before the council 's development control committee on 23 february .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: northamptonshire pcc approves new police buildings
text: plans for two new police buildings in northamptonshire have been formally given the go-ahead by police and crime commissioner adam simmonds .
work will start soon on the police investigation centre and the northern accommodation building off the a43 in kettering .
the buildings , which will be used by 350 staff , are set to be completed by spring 2017 .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: machete attack in corby
text: police in corby are asking anyone who witnessed a fight in leighton road to contact them , after a man was attacked with a machete .
the victim met a friend on thursday , 4 february , at some point between 14:00 and 15:30 .
an unknown man attacked him , causing head , arm , hand and leg injuries .
he needed medical treatment but the injuries were not life threatening .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: millionaire 's three nights on streets of northampton was 'like having your soul sucked out '
text: a powerful video showing a millionaire businessman sleeping rough on the streets of northampton during a freezing january weekend has raised £ 3,000 for one of the town 's homeless charities .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: northampton councillors advised not to object to new rushden lakes plan
text: northampton borough council is not planning to object to plans for a leisure building , including a cinema , restaurant and retail units , at the rushden lakes development .
the authority will discuss its response to the application , due to be decided on by east northamptonshire council , at a meeting tonight .

borough councillors originally opposed the scheme saying it would affect northampton 's retail and leisure offering , but officers say the revised plan - which sees more leisure and less retail space - is unlikely `` to represent any significant increased impacts on the vitality and viability of northampton to the scheme already approved '' .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: whispering bob 's first ever festival is a northamptonshire homecoming
text: northampton-born broadcaster whispering '' bob harris is set to return to the county that fed his love of music to host his first ever festival - 50 years after leaving for the bright lights of london .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: work gets underway to turn m1 into smart mortorway
text: work to turn the m1 between northampton and the m6 into a smart motorway has just got underway .
it means the hard shoulder will become an extra lane and variable speed limits introduced to better manage traffic .
highways england says the roadworks are being completed in stages to minimise delays for motorists .

documents.title: kettering may endorse dna profiling to stop dog fouling
text: councillors in kettering may follow a village in essex and carry out dna profiling of dogs to try and tackle the problem of fouling .
alresford , near brightlingsea , backed plans to carry out the dna testing of dogs and faeces .
the scheme is run on a voluntary basis and councillors in kettering are looking to do the same .

documents.title: headlines : cobblers ' sponsorship deal with university of northampton dna dog profiling
text: the main stories at lunch :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: dna profiling of dogs to identify poo miscreants
text: decision makers in kettering will tonight discuss the possibility of introducing dna profiling of dogs in an effort to reduce incidents of fouling .
if it receives a positive response from the research and development committee , kettering borough council could look to ask the public for its views on the move .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: clean air campaigners hit out at removal of age limit on taxis and cabs
text: a decision to remove the upper age limit for taxis and private hire vehicles in northampton has been criticised by drivers and clean air campaigners .
northampton borough council says stringent checks remain in place on any vehicle before it 's given a licence , but taxi operators says the town is becoming a `` dumping ground '' for old vehicles .
andrea lee , who campaigns for cleaner air with the environmental law organisation client earth , said the removal of age limits for taxis could affect air quality in the town .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cobblers ' chairman says club need to get east stand built - so shaq has a seat
text: kelvin thomas has been speaking about us basketball legend , shaquille o'neal 's video supporting the cobblers .
the pair know each other as they co-own an us internet radio station , and thomas said shaq has mentioned coming to see the club play before .
shaq is a great guy and it 's just a bit of fun really , but it also shows northampton town in a really positive light .
i said ( to him ) let me finish the east stand first so he 's got some where to sit . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ricky holmes ' stunning strike named league two goal of the weekend
text: northampton town 's ricky holmes scored a spectacular second in his side 's 4-0 demolition of leyton orient at the weekend .
and today , the goal has been named the league two goal of the weekend .
if you have n't seen it , click the link in the tweet - lionel messi would have been proud
sky bet league 2
skybetleague2

documents.title: university deal about 'community , ' says cobblers ' chairman
text: kelvin thomas says the club 's new sponsorship deal with the university of northampton is a reflection of how well the club is working with the community .
the university of northampton has extended it 's support fro the clubs by another three years .
this partnership has not come about just because we 're at the top of the table .
this is the university backing and partnering the football club which they 've shown they can do through some tougher times . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: what you need to know about cobblers supporter and us basketball legend , shaq
text: here 's more about cobbler 's fan and us basketball legend shaq , who has recorded a video wishing northampton town good luck .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: university of northampton extend deal with cobblers for further three years
text: in the past half hour it 's been announced that the university of northampton has extended its sponsorship deal with northampton town .
the three year deal was confirmed by the university 's vice-chancellor , prof nick petford and the cobblers ' chairman , kelvin thomas .

documents.title: northampton chairman kelvin thomas 'proud ' of university of northampton sponsorship
text: northampton town and the university of northampton have extended their shirt sponsorship agreement for a further three years .
the club has tweeted chairman kelvin thomas ' reaction to the deal
kelvin thomas : ''we are proud to carry the name of @ twitterid on our shirts .
we are grateful for the loyalty and support they 've shown . ''

documents.title: cobblers renew deal with university of northampton
text: northampton town and the university of northampton have extended their partnership agreement for another three years .
more to come on this story .
breaking : northampton town football club and @ twitterid have extended their principal partner partnership for a further 3 years .

documents.title: safer roads team issues icy roads warning
text: an ice and fog warning has been issued for drivers by the safer roads team

documents.title: us basketball 's shaquille o'neal looking forward to visiting sixfields
text: retired us basketball star shaquille o'neal says he 's looking forward to watching northampton town play at sixfields .
o'neal , known as shaq , co-owns an internet radio station in the usa with cobblers ' chairman kelvin thomas .
in a youtube video , he said : `` i just wanted to wish kelvin and all the cobblers best of luck .
first place is where i like to be and it 's great to see you guys at the top . ''
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: weather : cold and crisp with plenty of sunshine
text: staying crisp and dry today , with lots of sunshine .
temperatures reaching 6c ( 43f ) .
weather has more local details .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: shaq backs the cobblers
text: us basketball star shaquille o'neal has given his backing to northampton town in a youtube clip .
in the video , the retired 7ft 1in ( 2.16m ) nba player praises the club , which is five points clear at the top of league two .
o'neal , known as shaq , co-owns an internet radio station in the usa with cobblers chairman kelvin thomas .
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: headlines : shaquille o'neal 's backing for cobblers northampton becoming a 'dumping ground for old taxis '

documents.title: hello and welcome to tuesday 's northamptonshire live
text: between now and 18:00 , the team here will bring you the news , sport , travel and weather updates as we get them .
if you want to get in touch then please email us or tweet us .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live
